text: In a coded template, how would you make a module uneditable in page editor? I have this issue with a custom module, but I dont want to lock all its fields. I want it to be uneditable in an hubdb dynamic page template. I would assume there is a module attribute(editable_in_page_editor??) that I can set in the template when I call the module to make the it uneditable in page editor programmatically, I just cant find doc on it.

New to the channel: I am a php developer looking to build a dynamic HUBL template. I am looking to send an email with a link to a landing page and use all the great tracking variables that HubSpot has on a HubSpot landing page. I would like to start by printing all those variables back on the landing page after a user clicks the link. Is that available in the HUBL language?
